external_games.name: Bishoujo Wrestler Retsuden: Blizzard Yuki Rannyuu
Bishoujo Wrestler Retsuden: Blizzard Yuki Rannyuu

name: Bishoujo Wrestler Retsuden: Blizzard Yuki Rannyuu!!
summary: Blizzard Yuki must take on the Wrestle Angels and make her way to the top of the promotion to become the dominant female wrestler! Battle several of your favorite Wrestle Angels and use the familiar V1 card system!
